poster: S E Y T A N
title: looking for good support bronze-silver-gold
body:
add me in game - s e y t a n - 

I need a support who wanna get out of hell.

replies.body:
I can help with Support, normally play Morgana with S games

S1LAS
How could you do this to me LMAO.

I'd be happy to game with you, and climb above bronze if that's the desired flavor.

I can do pretty well with blitzy, when my hook game is on i never miss. But when its off, well you better prepare to farm under tower with me lol
I find I play really good with him though if there is good synergy between myself and my adc. Some players it just happens with, others we just don't click.
I think this is the key to being a successful bot duo. Not just individual talent, but synergy
